3 YEAR CONSENT PERIOD FOR LBC and CAC: The works hereby permitted shall be begun not later than three years from the date of this consent.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 18(1)(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).

Ref: P2016/2819/LBC

Listed Building Consent in connection with conversion of Public House to form 2no. split. level flats (1x 2bedroom flat and 1x4bedroom flat) across ground floor and basement levels, demolition of external fire escape and 2 no. WC extensions. Associated internal and external alterations. Creation of associated split-level residential garden areas across rear basement and ground floor level areas and installation of timber fence fronting North Road.

The Listed Building Consent documents are:
883.000; 883.001C; 883.002D; 883.003B; 883.004; 883.005; 883.006A; 883.007; 883.008; 883.009A; 883.101C; 883.102E; 883.103C; 883.104; 883.105; 883.106A; 883.107A; 883.108; 883.109A; 883.110A; 883.111; Design & Access Statement September 2016 883.DA02A; Heritage Statement September 2016 883.HS02A; Development Viability Report April 2017 833.VR01; High Level Cost Appraisal 01 & Supporting Information.

The details addressing Condition 3 and Condition 4 of this Listed Building Consent have been approved, Ref: P2019/3368/AOD.
Those approved application documents are: Discharge of Conditions Statement - Condition 3; Discharge of Conditions Statement - Condition 4; 883.401; 883.402; 883.403; 883.405; 883.406; 883.407; 883.408; 883.409; 883.410; 883.411; 883.412; 883.413; 883.414; 883.415; 883.416; 883.417 & 883.404.

Additionally, Listed Building Consent Ref: P2020/1398/LBC was granted on 17th September 2020, for “installing a partition within the bar area to create a new room and changes to the bar at ground floor, internal alterations to partitions in the basement.”

Those approved application documents are: 883_000 Site Location Plan, 883lbc.101b, 883lbc.102b, Heritage Statement, Listed Building Consent Statement.
description: Revisions to previously approved Listed Building Consent ref: P2016/2819/LBC dated 04/07/2019 to include: retention of the existing rear single storey extension and alteration to the roof over the approved new common stair.
